title.narrative: 6.2 EDUCATION

description.narrative: EAPR has strengthened evidence, partnerships and resurce mobilization capacity to improve EDUCATION outcomes., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: EAPR effectively leverages and utilises resources, strategic partnerships, innovations, data and evidence to drive results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: EAPR has strengthened evidence, partnerships and resurce mobilization capacity to improve EDUCATION outcomes.

description.narrative: RO Education Team has further advanced its leadership not only in responding to the challenges posed by the COVID19 pandemic, but also in further advancing key initiatives including early learning, inclusive and quality primary education, adolescent and second-decade education, education in emergencies and climate change, and education system strengthening and governance. It also enhanced stronger partnerships to move forward the SDG4 agenda and deliver strategic results for children and adolescents in the region.Highlights were theASEAN Policy Brief and the ASEAN Guidelines on Reopening, Recovery and Resilience in Education and the Regional Guidelines on Reopening Early Learning Services.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/03/2022
